column1: Little Goat Diner////I try the Rueben almost everywhere I go that has it
column2: and theirs was maybe the best I've had. Everything else we had was top notch as well. For the quality
column3: it was very reasonably priced as well. Surprisingly there was no wait when everything else nearby was on an hour or more
column4: although they do have a lot of room for seating. Most definitely worth a stop for seriously good food.
